metadata.title: LTX-2 Camera Control NSFW Scat Video
metadata.description: Generate camera-motion controlled fetish videos using LTX-2 19B model with HyperDump theme. Supports dolly-left camera movement for dynamic scenes. Optimized for high-quality scat-themed content with smooth camera transitions.

quality_settings.steps: 25 steps (balance speed/quality) - Use 15-20 for previews, 30-40 for production
quality_settings.cfg: 7.5 (moderate guidance) - Lower (5-6) for more creativity, higher (8-10) for prompt adherence
quality_settings.sampler: dpmpp_2m + karras scheduler (best quality for LTX-2)
quality_settings.estimated_time: 3-5 minutes on high-end GPU (RTX 4090), 8-12 minutes on mid-range

camera_control_lora.tips: If camera movement too subtle, increase to 0.9-1.0. If jerky/unstable, decrease to 0.6-0.7

hyperdump_lora.purpose: Enhances scat/defecation theme with explicit details
hyperdump_lora.tips: Higher weights (1.2-1.5) for extreme content. Lower (0.8-1.0) for subtle. Current 0.7 is too low for strong fetish theme.

lora_stack_guide.stacking_order: Camera Control → Fetish Theme. This order ensures camera movement is applied first, then content styling.

prompting_tips.positive_structure: Start with quality tags (score_9, masterpiece) → Subject (1girl, full body) → Action (scat, hyper dump) → Camera (dolly left) → Style modifiers (realistic texture, detailed anatomy)
positive_boosters: (realistic texture:1.3) - Enhances skin and material realism
(smooth camera movement:1.2) - Emphasizes camera control effect
prompting_tips.advanced_prompting: For stronger fetish emphasis, add: (explicit defecation:1.4), (visible mess:1.3), (intense expression:1.2). For artistic variant: (cinematic lighting:1.3), (dramatic angle:1.2)

workflow_flow.step_2: Load Gemma 3 text encoder (12B for complex prompts)
workflow_flow.step_5: Encode positive prompt with quality tags + fetish keywords
workflow_flow.step_6: Encode negative prompt to filter unwanted elements
workflow_flow.step_8: Sample with DPM++ 2M + Karras (25 steps, CFG 7.5)

expected_output.content: Single subject with scat theme, camera slowly dollying left throughout sequence
expected_output.quality: High-detail realistic rendering with smooth camera motion

optimization_tips.for_speed: Reduce steps to 15-20, lower resolution to 640x832, use FP8 models (already enabled)
optimization_tips.for_quality: Increase steps to 30-40, add spatial upscaler node (2x), use higher CFG (8-9)
optimization_tips.for_vram_savings: Enable tiled VAE decoding (if available in LTX nodes), reduce frame count to 25-33
optimization_tips.for_longer_videos: Increase frame count to 97 (4 sec) or 145 (6 sec), but expect 2-3x longer generation time

troubleshooting.camera_not_moving: Increase camera LoRA weight to 0.9-1.0, ensure 'camera dolly left' in positive prompt
troubleshooting.weak_fetish_theme: Increase HyperDump weight to 1.2-1.5, add explicit keywords to prompt
troubleshooting.blurry_output: Increase sampling steps to 30-35, ensure CFG not too low (keep 7-9)
troubleshooting.anatomy_issues: Add (perfect anatomy:1.4) to positive, (deformed:1.5) to negative. Consider adding FaceDetailer node post-processing
troubleshooting.out_of_memory: Reduce resolution to 640x832 or frame count to 25. Enable CPU offloading if available

recommended_enhancements.add_upscaler: Insert LTX-2 Spatial Upscaler after decoder for 2x resolution (1664x2432)
recommended_enhancements.add_face_detailer: Use ADetailer or FaceDetailer node after decoder to refine facial expressions
recommended_enhancements.add_frame_interpolation: Use RIFE to double frame rate (24→48 FPS) for ultra-smooth motion
recommended_enhancements.add_lora_mixer: Use Power LoRA Loader from rgthree for precise weight control and A/B testing

metadata.author: AI Kings Production System

widgets_values: score_9, score_8_up, rating_explicit, masterpiece, best quality, cinematic, 1girl, full body, realistic texture, nsfw, scat, defecation, hyper dump, camera dolly left, smooth camera movement, explicit sex, detailed anatomy, mo-e motion
score_6, score_5, low quality, worst quality, watermark, static camera, frozen, clean, sanitary
